name: Sweet Maze (arincdemir, burcu.kilic, roboticrustacean)
description:
"Sweet maze" is a game about our protagonist Hans and his misfortunes on his way out of the evil Witch's candy house. Face off sweet abominations made by the witch and leave breadcrumb trails to return to when you die.

Burcu Kılıç - Game Developer

Bora Depecik - Game Developer

Arınç Demir - SFX & Original soundtrack

Uygar Apan - 2D artist & Art Direction
